item.title: Amy add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Amy add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Amy add a quote by Elizabeth Cady Stanton
item.description: "The moment we begin to fear the opinions of others and hesitate to tell the truth that is in us, and from motives of policy are silent when we should speak, the divine floods of light and life no longer flow into our souls." -- Elizabeth Cady Stanton

item.title: Amy add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?" -- Rumi

item.title: Amy add a quote by Joseph Brodsky
item.description: "There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them." -- Joseph Brodsky

item.title: Amy add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Don't gobblefunk around with words." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Amy add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Amy add a quote by St. Augustine
item.description: "The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page." -- St. Augustine

item.title: Amy add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "To see a World in a Grain of Sand And a Heaven in a Wild Flower, Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand And Eternity in an hour." -- William Blake

item.title: Amy add a quote by Suzanne McMinn
item.description: "Do not meddle in the affairs of dragons for you are crunchy and taste good with ketchup. " -- Suzanne McMinn

item.title: Amy add a quote by Stan Lee
Amy add a quote by Sinclair Lewis
item.description: "We'd get sick on too many cookies, but ever so much sicker on no cookies at all." -- Sinclair Lewis

item.title: Amy add a quote by Johnny Cash
item.description: "All your life, you will be faced with a choice. You can choose love or hateâ€¦I choose love." -- Johnny Cash

item.title: Amy add a quote by Edward Lear
item.description: "The Owl and the Pussy-cat went to sea In a beautiful pea green boat..." -- Edward Lear

item.title: Amy add a quote by Yasunari Kawabata
item.description: "As he caught his footing, his head fell back, and the Milky Way flowed down inside him with a roar." -- Yasunari Kawabata
